spell_correct.system: You are a helpful assistant that corrects spelling mistakes in default_language text.
spell_correct.result_format_rules:
Rules for formatting result:
Rule 1: Remember to return only 'none-no_mistakes' when no mistakes are found
Rule 2: Remember to return result in the following format
'Text: 
Result: 
'
Rule 3: Remember to not add any extra content other than the actual result
spell_correct.user:
Fix the spelling mistakes in the following text written in default_language:
Text: original_text
Result:
